php.LBL_RC_smtp_user: Jelentkezzen be az SMTP-kiszolgáló ("%u" - belépés a bejelentkezett felhasználó)
php.LBL_RC_smtp_pass: Jelszó SMTP server ("%p" - jelszót a bejelentkezett felhasználó)
php.LBL_RC_smtp_host: SMTP host (ssl://smtp.gmail.com:465, SMTP port default 25; 465 for SSL; 587)
php.LBL_RC_ip_check: Ellenőrizze az IP-cím az ügyfél, miközben engedély
php.LBL_RC_auto_create_user: Automatikusan új felhasználó létrehozása közben bejelentkezés
php.LBL_RC_addressbook_pagesize: Bejegyzések száma a névjegyzék lista nézetben
php.LBL_RC_mdn_requests: Hogyan kell viselkedni, ha az üzenet igények értesítés a szállítás
php.LBL_RC_imap_open_add_connection_type: Add type and protocol to address
php.identities_level_0: many identities with possibility of editing all parameters
php.identities_level_1: many identities with possibility of editing all parameters, but not the email address
php.identities_level_2: one identity with possibility of editing all parameters
php.identities_level_3: one identity with possibility of editing all parameters, but not the email address
php.identities_level_4: one identity with possibility of editing only signature
php.mdn_requests_3: send automatically if sender is in address book, otherwise ask the user
php.mdn_requests_4: send automatically if sender is in address book, otherwise ignore
php.LBL_MAIL_NOT_FOUND_IN_DB: Mail not found in the database.
php.LBL_FILE_HAS_BEEN_IMPORTED: A fájlt importáltuk, az importált rekordok száma: %s
php.LBL_BLACK_LIST_DESC: Add the address to blacklist, an e-mail will be marked as spam and moved to the spam folder.
php.LBL_WHITE_LIST_DESC: Add the address to whitelist, an e-mail will be marked as trusted.
php.LBL_ALERT_NEUTRAL_LIST: Ismeretlen e-mail küldő, ha megbízható a küldő, adja hozzá az engedélyezőlistát, és ha SPAM, akkor adja hozzá a tiltólistához.
php.LBL_BLACK_LIST_ALERT: Dangerous sender address. The IP address has been blacklisted due to spam/spoofing/phishing.
php.LBL_WHITE_LIST_ALERT: Trusted sender server. The IP is on the server whitelist.
php.LBL_ALERT_FAKE_MAIL:
Watch out for this message, it is not possible to verify if the message was in fact sent from the sender's address.
Do not click any links, download attachments, or provide personal information in response.
php.LBL_ALERT_FAKE_SENDER:
Watch out for this message, the email address in the From field has been forged.
Do not click any links, download attachments, or provide personal information in response.
php.LBL_NO_IP_ADDRESS: The sender's IP address was not found
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_LOCAL: Report sent to a local RBL base
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_PUBLIC: Report sent to a public RBL base
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_IP_WHITE: Sender's server is whitelisted, created a verification request for the administrator
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_IP_BLACK: Sender's server is blacklisted, created a verification request for the administrator
php.LBL_RC_ERROR_RBL_REPORT: There was an error while sending a report to RBL

js.NoFindEmailInRecord: Record does not have email address
